item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:

14. Why America's economy is soaring ahead of its rivals (319 points | 1442 comments)

29. How Typing Transformed Nietzsche's Consciousness (59 points | 23 comments)
